name: LittleWars
description:
A defence game where the player selects their own army and fights oncoming hordes of enemies, as the player gains more units, they empower each other, making them able to hit harder and take harder hits.

Art was not created by me and can be downloaded here-https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/pixel-art-platformer-villa...
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/free-pixel-font-thaleah-140059https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/pixel-art-top-down-basic-1...

A* pathfinding algorithm is also not mine, downloadable here-https://arongranberg.com/astar/download
